alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Canadian; Custer; Dewey; Major; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 11:19AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Custer, Blaine, Dewey, southwestern Major, northwestern Canadian and southeastern Woodward Counties through NOON CDT... At 1119 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Taloga to 4 miles west of Custer City. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watonga, Fairview, Taloga, Geary, Thomas, Seiling, Arapaho, Canton, Custer City, Butler, Longdale, Camargo, Hitchcock, Greenfield, Oakwood, Putnam, Canton Lake, Foss Reservoir, Orienta, and Cestos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Canadian; Custer; Dewey; Major; Woodward
